full_text: Human beings are not alone in having invented vaccination. In fact, a new paper confirms that honeybees got there first https://t.co/vO1Zn6gaOv

localize.full_text: 人类并不是唯一发明了疫苗的人。事实上，一篇新的论文证实，蜜蜂最先有https://t.co/vO1Zn6gaOv。
